A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was disheartening to watch. I knew Disney would ruin Star Wars the moment I discovered they bought the rights. This movie is filled with plot holes\, pointless subplots\, unexplained occurences (shirtless Kylo Ren skyping with Rey???)  and character arcs so flimsy that they leave me little to care about.\n\nWhat they did to Luke Skywalker in this movie\, however\, is the most unforgiveable thing. I felt like I wasn't even watching the same person on screen.
